about.details:
Incorporated in 2007, Active Infrastructures Limited is a civil construction company. The company specializes in infrastructure development and commercial project construction.

The company focuses on infrastructure projects like roads, bridges, water supply systems, and irrigation, while also constructing commercial spaces such as office complexes, retail centers, exhibition halls, and educational institutions.

The company operates across India, with projects in Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Uttar Pradesh, and Tripura. It focuses on customer satisfaction, ensuring quality and safety in all completed, ongoing, and upcoming projects.

Services:
  • Infrastructure Segment: The company excels in infrastructure, focusing on road construction, flyovers, water supply systems, irrigation, and related activities. It also manages heritage site development and tourism projects, ensuring quality and sustainability.
  • Construction of Commercial Project Segment: The company focuses on creating commercial spaces that meet evolving business and consumer needs. Key projects like RIAAN Tower offer modern, sustainable environments, supporting business growth and community engagement.

As of March 13, 2025, the company has 53 permanent and 150 - 160 contractual employees.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Experienced Management Team
  • Quality Assurance and Standards
  • Optimal Utilization of Resources
  • Visible growth through increasing order book

faqs.question: What is the Active Infrastructures IPO?
faqs.answer:
Active Infrastructures IPO is a SME IPO of 4300200 equity shares of the face value of ₹5 aggregating up to ₹77.83 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹181 per share. The minimum order quantity is 600.

The IPO opens on March 21, 2025, and closes on March 25, 2025.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Active Infrastructures IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Active Infrastructures IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Active Infrastructures IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Active Infrastructures IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Active Infrastructures IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Active Infrastructures IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Active Infrastructures IPO opens on March 21, 2025 and closes on March 25, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Active Infrastructures IPO?
faqs.answer: Active Infrastructures IPO lot size is 600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,600.

faqs.question: How to apply for Active Infrastructures IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Active Infrastructures IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Active Infrastructures IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Active Infrastructures IPO will be done on Wednesday, March 26, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, March 27, 2025. Check the Active Infrastructures IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Active Infrastructures IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Active Infrastructures IPO listing date is on Friday, March 28, 2025.
